scenario_text.value: Ugh... T-Takuma...
Aoi! Are you back to normal?

Kinda... I was able to pull her out of that
vision, but...

I don’t think she can even stand up in this
state.

Dammit! These guys are making us look like
a buncha idiots!

Don’t push it, man. I know what a toll those
visions can take on you.

I’ll look for the others. You rest out of
sight for now.
A’ight... Thanks, man.
Ungh... Aaah...

We beat the bad guys, but those four are
still stuck in the illusion...
Is there anything we can do, Takuma?

(Agumon’s voice pulled me out of my
illusion.)
(Maybe if I do the same for them...!)

Pull yourself together, guys! Don’t be
deceived by this illusion!
Huh?!
Unngh... Damn! The heck did they do to us?!
Are you guys back to normal?

Yeah... Shit, what the heck were we doing up
to now?

Thanks, Takuma. Your voice brought him back
to us.
We’re in...a library?
When’d we get here? Where even are we?

It’s a new building that appeared here. You
were too caught up in Renamon’s illusion.
Renamon...? Right, it was a trap.
Takuma, I... I saw Haru.
You did?!

No, wait... Now that I think about it, that
might’ve been part of the illusion, too...
Ugh... My head’s killing me.
It’s okay, Kaito, just take it easy!

(They’re not doing too great. Might be hard to
take them anywhere.)

Everyone, go hide behind that bookshelf. I’m
going to look for the others.
Got it. Be careful out there.
